title: Round Objects
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>It’s been a while since we last played.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You won again today, Karin...... I guess there’s no way I can beat you at a dance game......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, so what you’re trying to say is, I’m good at dancing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Losing every time I play is no fun! There has to be a fairer game...... Ah, there! Air hockey! Our air hockey skill levels are probably the same!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I don’t really play that often...... But I’ll play with you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Alright Karin-san, let’s battle!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Why~~~!? How could this thin disk hit me in the face!? This isn’t even a ball game~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Shizuku-chan, are you okay? I’ll go wet my handkerchief and try to ice it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ugh...... Is it because I don’t just have bad luck with balls but also with anything round......!? Ugh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
